mapper.select: SELECT ucc.*, ( SELECT ui.nickname FROM user_info ui WHERE ui.uid = ucc.contacts_uid ) AS contactsUname, ( SELECT ui.mobile FROM user_info ui WHERE ui.uid = ucc.contacts_uid ) AS contactsMobile, ( SELECT ui.nickname FROM user_info ui WHERE ui.uid = ucc.complaint_uid ) AS complaintUname, ( SELECT ui.mobile FROM user_info ui WHERE ui.uid = ucc.complaint_uid ) AS complaintMobile FROM user_complaint ucc WHERE ucc.order_id = #{id}
